PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_SwitchingDeviceTypeToggleSwitch
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: A toggle switch is a switch that enables or isolates electrical power through a two position on/off action..

PropertyDef.Name: ToggleSwitchType
PropertyDef.Definition: A list of the available types of toggle switch from which that required may be selected.

PropertyDef.Name: SwitchUsage
PropertyDef.Definition: A list of the available usages for toggle switches from which that required may be selected

PropertyDef.Name: SwitchActivation
PropertyDef.Definition: A list of the available activations for toggle switches from which that required may be selected

PropertyDef.Name: IsIlluminated
PropertyDef.Definition: An indication of whether there is an illuminated indicator to show that the switch is on (=TRUE) or not (= FALSE).

PropertyDef.Name: Legend
PropertyDef.Definition: A text inscribed or applied to the switch as a legend to indicate purpose or function.
